hints.content: Which of the shapes also has $4$ sides?

This shape belongs in the group:

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A four-sided shape. The top side is labeled 7 meters, the bottom side is labeled 10 meters, the left side is labeled 9 meters, and the right side is labeled 8 meters. !

question.content:
The following shapes all belong to the same group.

 | | 
- | - | -
![A four-sided shape. The top side is labeled 5 meters, the bottom side is labeled 6 meters, the left side is labeled 4 meters, and the right side is labeled 3 meters. The corners of the shape are not right angles. ](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/25fc7d2c776a637f2a24c7dc998b6748bbd343ac) | ![A four-sided shape. The longer sides are labeled 15 meters each. The shorter sides are labeled 8 meters each. The corners of the shape are right angles.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/be7afa2e3eed8e500d02da29a91b1cf254fa63fa) | ![A four-sided shape. The top side is labeled 10 centimeters, the bottom side is labeled 7 centimeters, the left side is labeled 8 centimeters, and the right side is labeled 8 centimeters. The corners of the shape are not right angles.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/1430e415a50ff59338a5a48e4614bc2f63c246b4)

All of the shapes have $4$ sides.

**Which of the following shapes belongs in the group?**

[[☃ radio 1]]

choices.content: ![A five-sided shape. Each side is labeled 6 meters.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/231049cce6ea1b5175b79706377ecf742158721a)

![A four-sided shape. The top side is labeled 7 meters, the bottom side is labeled 10 meters, the left side is labeled 9 meters, and the right side is labeled 8 meters.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/b71ddfb4fa63a94ebe50ff3ebc1fb84132bbd2d2)

![A five-sided shape. The sides are labeled in a clockwise direction as follows starting from the top: 8 meters, 3 meters, 2 meters, 6 meters, and 4 meters.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/a63a98b20f70d1de9b490e12f20da1cc10a1553b)

![A five-sided shape. The sides are labeled in a clockwise direction as follows starting from the top: 6 meters, 5 meters, 4 meters, 8 meters, and 4 meters.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/8b70100709e90345234b10663d171025e413e67c)
